name: Our Lady of Perpetual Help Catholic Church (St. Boniface Church)
description: Our Lady of Perpetual Help Catholic Church, also known as St. Boniface Church, is a Catholic parish serving the Williamsburg, Kentucky community. The church provides spiritual services including regular Mass celebrations, sacraments, and religious education. The parish also operates a food pantry and senior commodities program to assist community members in need. The church is part of the Diocese of Lexington and serves as a spiritual and community resource for Catholic families and individuals in the Williamsburg area.
source: Verified from multiple online directories and church listings
hours: Mass times vary - contact church for current schedule
eligibility: Open to all community members for spiritual services. Food pantry and assistance programs may have specific eligibility requirements.
notes: Pastor: Rev. Jesuraj Mariasalethu. The church also operates St. Boniface Catholic Cemetery. Part of the Diocese of Lexington. Contact for current Mass times and food pantry hours.
